name: ASSOCIATION OF LOUISIANA ELECTRIC COOPERATIVES
description: Non-profit organization that represents electric distribution cooperatives in Louisiana.
sampleDescriptions: Advocate to Congress for enhancement of Louisiana electric distribution infrastructure managed by rural cooperatives.
